title: Tadej Pogačar Already Conserving Legs for Tour de France: ‘I Don’t Need to Push Over the Limit’
content:
Will Pogačar keep attacking or race more conservatively in the second half of the Giro d'Italia? 'I'm happy I have a bigger gap.'

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Already Conserving Legs for Tour de France: ‘I Don’t Need to Push Over the Limit’ on Velo.
author: ahood
